name: refurnish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put new or different furniture in a room, home, or other building: The comfortable bedrooms have been recently re-furnished. The trend for home owners to refurnish in line with latest fashions has been blown away by the recession.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lounge will be re-furnished this year.They needed money badly to re-furnish their family home.Napoleon refurnished the palace after the looting of the Revolution.
